thread.title: Bella Hadid Celebrates Mom Yolanda's Birthday in NYC Amid The Weeknd Drama -- See the Sweet Family Pics!
thread.title_full: Bella Hadid Celebrates Mom Yolanda's Birthday in NYC Amid The Weeknd Drama -- See the Sweet Family Pics!

author: Meredith B. Kile
title: Bella Hadid Celebrates Mom Yolanda's Birthday in NYC Amid The Weeknd Drama -- See the Sweet Family Pics!
text: Bella Hadid Celebrates Mom Yolanda's Birthday in NYC Amid The Weeknd Drama -- See the Sweet Family Pics! by Meredith B. Kile 7:01 PM PST, January 15, 2017 Playing Bella Hadid Celebrates Mom Yolanda's Birthday in NYC Amid The Weeknd Drama -- See the Sweet Family Pics! As drama brews surrounding The Weeknd and Selena Gomez, Bella Hadid is spending time with family. Just a few days after her ex was spotted kissing the "Can't Keep My Hands to Myself" singer during a PDA-filled date night in Los Angeles, Hadid stepped out with her sister, Gigi Hadid, and mom Yolanda in NYC for a family dinner. Photo: Splash News The trio were all smiles as they headed to dinner at Nobu, where Bella shared a snap of her mom smiling as she opened a birthday present. Photo: Snapchat Gigi posted a sweet Instagram tribute to Yolanda on Jan. 11, her actual birthday, sharing a throwback photo with a heartfelt caption. “To the most compassionate, supportive, loving, intelligent, creative SUPERmom in the world.. I am so lucky to have someone like you to look up to,” she wrote. “Thank you for everything (especially @bellahadid & @anwarhadid), I love you so much! Happy Birthday!!!” A photo posted by Gigi Hadid (@gigihadid) on Jan 11, 2017 at 9:02am PST WATCH: Bella Hadid Unfollows Selena Gomez on Instagram After Singer Is Spotted Kissing The Weeknd -- See the Pics! Meanwhile, Bella has stayed pretty quiet on social media, though she did retweet a photo of herself flipping off the NYC paparazzi on Friday. See more on the pic (perhaps a message to her ex and his new squeeze?) in the video below.
